languages.text: "Это тебе так кажется. Я даже не буду наказывать тебя за непокорство — ты сейчас пораскинешь мозгами и сам{mf||а} поймешь, что выжить в Комморре без друзей у тебя не выйдет. Тебе нужно убежище, орудие, помощь лекаря. А мне нужно то, что у Комиссара на плечах".

traits.locale_text: "Это тебе так кажется. Я даже не буду наказывать тебя за непокорство — ты сейчас пораскинешь мозгами и сам{mf||а} поймешь, что выжить в Комморре без друзей у тебя не выйдет. Тебе нужно убежище, орудие, помощь лекаря. А мне нужно то, что у Комиссара на плечах".
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "That's what you think. I'm not even going to punish you for your disobedience — you'll think about it and realise on your own that you won't survive in Commorragh without friends. You need shelter, weapons, a healer. And I need what's sitting on the Commissar's shoulders."
languages.original_text: "Это тебе так кажется. Я даже не буду наказывать тебя за непокорство — ты сейчас пораскинешь мозгами и сам{mf||а} поймешь, что выжить в Комморре без друзей у тебя не выйдет. Тебе нужно убежище, орудие, помощь лекаря. А мне нужно то, что у Комиссара на плечах".

traits.locale_text: "That's what you think. I'm not even going to punish you for your disobedience — you'll think about it and realise on your own that you won't survive in Commorragh without friends. You need shelter, weapons, a healer. And I need what's sitting on the Commissar's shoulders."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "That's what you think. I'm not even going to punish you for your disobedience — you'll think about it and realise on your own that you won't survive in Commorragh without friends. You need shelter, weapons, a healer. And I need what's sitting on the Commissar's shoulders."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "That's what you think. I'm not even going to punish you for your disobedience — you'll think about it and realise on your own that you won't survive in Commorragh without friends. You need shelter, weapons, a healer. And I need what's sitting on the Commissar's shoulders."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "That's what you think. I'm not even going to punish you for your disobedience — you'll think about it and realise on your own that you won't survive in Commorragh without friends. You need shelter, weapons, a healer. And I need what's sitting on the Commissar's shoulders."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “这是你自己的想法，我甚至都没打算因为你不服从而惩罚你。只要好好想想，你就会意识到，如果没有朋友，你根本无法在科摩罗生存下来。你需要住处、武器，还需要一位治疗师，而我需要你把政委脖子上的东西摘下来。”
languages.original_text: "That's what you think. I'm not even going to punish you for your disobedience — you'll think about it and realise on your own that you won't survive in Commorragh without friends. You need shelter, weapons, a healer. And I need what's sitting on the Commissar's shoulders."

traits.locale_text: “这是你自己的想法，我甚至都没打算因为你不服从而惩罚你。只要好好想想，你就会意识到，如果没有朋友，你根本无法在科摩罗生存下来。你需要住处、武器，还需要一位治疗师，而我需要你把政委脖子上的东西摘下来。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「今はそう思うだろう。俺に従わないからといって貴様を折檻するつもりはない――ひとりではコモラフで生き延びられないことにいずれ気づくはずだ。貴様はシェルター、武器、そして治癒士を必要としている。そして、俺はコミッサーの首がほしい。ただそれだけだ」
languages.original_text: "That's what you think. I'm not even going to punish you for your disobedience — you'll think about it and realise on your own that you won't survive in Commorragh without friends. You need shelter, weapons, a healer. And I need what's sitting on the Commissar's shoulders."

traits.locale_text: 「今はそう思うだろう。俺に従わないからといって貴様を折檻するつもりはない――ひとりではコモラフで生き延びられないことにいずれ気づくはずだ。貴様はシェルター、武器、そして治癒士を必要としている。そして、俺はコミッサーの首がほしい。ただそれだけだ」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «Eso crees tú. No voy ni a castigarte por tu desobediencia, porque te darás cuenta tú mism{mf|o|a} de que no puedes sobrevivir en Commorragh sin amigos. Necesitas un techo, armas, un curandero... y yo necesito lo que el Comisario tiene sobre los hombros».
languages.original_text: "That's what you think. I'm not even going to punish you for your disobedience — you'll think about it and realise on your own that you won't survive in Commorragh without friends. You need shelter, weapons, a healer. And I need what's sitting on the Commissar's shoulders."

traits.locale_text: «Eso crees tú. No voy ni a castigarte por tu desobediencia, porque te darás cuenta tú mism{mf|o|a} de que no puedes sobrevivir en Commorragh sin amigos. Necesitas un techo, armas, un curandero... y yo necesito lo que el Comisario tiene sobre los hombros».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « C'est ce que vous croyez. Je ne vais même pas vous punir pour votre insolence, parce qu'en réfléchissant bien, vous finirez par vous rendre compte qu'il est impossible de survivre seul à Commorragh. Il vous faut un abri, des armes et un soigneur. Quant à moi, j'ai besoin de ce qui trône sur les épaules du commissaire. »
languages.original_text: "That's what you think. I'm not even going to punish you for your disobedience — you'll think about it and realise on your own that you won't survive in Commorragh without friends. You need shelter, weapons, a healer. And I need what's sitting on the Commissar's shoulders."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ce que vous croyez. Je ne vais même pas vous punir pour votre insolence, parce qu'en réfléchissant bien, vous finirez par vous rendre compte qu'il est impossible de survivre seul à Commorragh. Il vous faut un abri, des armes et un soigneur. Quant à moi, j'ai besoin de ce qui trône sur les épaules du commissaire. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Das denkt Ihr. Ich werde Euch für Euren Ungehorsam nicht einmal bestrafen – Ihr werdet darüber nachdenken und selbst zu dem Schluss kommen, dass Ihr in Commorragh ohne Freunde nicht überleben könnt. Ihr braucht eine Zuflucht, Waffen, einen Heiler. Und ich brauche das, was auf den Schultern des Kommissars sitzt."
languages.original_text: "That's what you think. I'm not even going to punish you for your disobedience — you'll think about it and realise on your own that you won't survive in Commorragh without friends. You need shelter, weapons, a healer. And I need what's sitting on the Commissar's shoulders."

traits.locale_text: "Das denkt Ihr. Ich werde Euch für Euren Ungehorsam nicht einmal bestrafen – Ihr werdet darüber nachdenken und selbst zu dem Schluss kommen, dass Ihr in Commorragh ohne Freunde nicht überleben könnt. Ihr braucht eine Zuflucht, Waffen, einen Heiler. Und ich brauche das, was auf den Schultern des Kommissars sitzt."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Sen öyle san. İtaatsizliğin için seni cezalandırmayacağım bile. Düşünüp taşınacak, dost edinmeden Commorragh'ta yaşayamayacağını göreceksin. Barınacak bir yere, silahlara, şifacıya muhtaçsın. Ben de Komiser'in kellesine muhtacım."
languages.original_text: "That's what you think. I'm not even going to punish you for your disobedience — you'll think about it and realise on your own that you won't survive in Commorragh without friends. You need shelter, weapons, a healer. And I need what's sitting on the Commissar's shoulders."

traits.locale_text: "Sen öyle san. İtaatsizliğin için seni cezalandırmayacağım bile. Düşünüp taşınacak, dost edinmeden Commorragh'ta yaşayamayacağını kendin anlayacaksın. Barınacak bir yerin, silahların yahut şifacın yok. Bana da Komiser'in kellesi lazım."
traits.speaker: Anger
